required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Your COACH Next Door Study. Dutch Title: Your COACH Next Door Studie.

brief_summary.textblock:
Your COACH Next Door (YCND) is a lifestyle intervention connecting children with overweight and their families with a coach close to home.
This study goal is to examine the effects of YCND for children and their families, (on their health, quality of life), and a process evaluation (process of the lifestyle intervention, and satisfaction for children, families and healthcare givers)

detailed_description.textblock:
Childhood overweight and obesity in an increasing problem worldwide. Among other, childhood obesity is associated with type 2 diabetes, cardiovascular disease, NAFLD and decreased quality of life. In 2016 the lifestyle intervention Your COACH Next Door (YCND) was founded in Maastricht, The Netherlands, as a tailored, network approach for children with overweight and obesity. YCND is following the example of COACH, the tailored lifestyleintervention for childhood obesity of the expertise centre of the MUMC+ hospital.
YCND is connecting children with overweight and their families with a coach close to home.
This study goal is to examine the effects of YCND for children and their families, (on their health, quality of life), and a process evaluation (process of the lifestyle intervention, and satisfaction for children, families and healthcare givers)

primary_outcome.time_frame: Every consult, primary outcome at 1 year, 2 years and 3 years of intervention.
primary_outcome.description: Weight measured as change in BMI z-score

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Measured at baseline and yearly until 3 years after start of intervention.
secondary_outcome.description: Presence of comorbidities measured in questionnaires, in which families and healthcare professionals can indicate if the child suffers from comorbidities (insulin resistance, DM II, hypertension, NAFLD, cardiovascular diseases) occur in the child.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Measured at baseline and yearly until 3 years after start of intervention.
secondary_outcome.description: Quality of life as measured with a validated questionaire

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Measured at baseline and yearly until 3 years after start of intervention.
secondary_outcome.description: Healthy eating pattern of the child as measured with a questionnaire (combination of Dutch Guidelines for healthy eating for children), to determ if the child is eating healthier or less healthy after start of the intervention.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Measured at baseline and yearly until 3 years after start of intervention.
secondary_outcome.description: Physical activity behaviour of the child as measured with a validated questionnaire for children.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Measured at baseline and yearly until 3 years after start of intervention.
secondary_outcome.description: Patient satisfaction regarding the YCND-program measured with a combination of a questionnaire and an interview.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Measured at baseline and yearly until 3 years after start of intervention.
secondary_outcome.description: Healthcare giver satisfaction regarding the YCND-program measured with a questionnaire and an interview.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Measured at baseline and yearly until 3 years after start of intervention.
secondary_outcome.description: Process evalution, primarily measured as consultations visited by the child

arm_group.arm_group_label: Children with overweight or obesity following the lifestyle intervention YCND
arm_group.description: Children with overweight or obesity that are participant of the lifestyle intervention YCND

intervention.description: Children in the study are attending the lifestyle intervention Your COACH Next Door. A coach is supporting the child and it's family to reach their goals regarding lifestyle.
intervention.arm_group_label: Children with overweight or obesity following the lifestyle intervention YCND

study_pop.textblock: Children with overweight or obesity, participant of the Your COACH Next Door lifestyleintervention.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Participant of the YCND lifestyle intervention.
- Having overweight or obesity
- Younger than 18 years at inclusion
Exclusion Criteria:
- No exclusion criteria
